Hallon was human male from the planet Corellia who served as a scrumrat in the White Worms gang of Coronet City. His duties for the gang included catching pests and working as a thief, as his small size allowed him to fit through spaces too narrow for older thieves.

In the year 13 BBY, Hallon was present in the den when fellow scrumrat Han was brought before Lady Proxima, leader of the gang. Han, who had returned from a trade with no goods for Proxima, used a rock to break a shutter behind the gang leader and bathe her in light, which burned her skin. Using the distraction, Han then pushed through the other scrumrats and escaped.
Hallon disobeyed orders from the gang and let pests that he caught in the den go alive. He had fair skin, brown hair, and green eyes.
Hallon wore a brown brine-stained shirt as well as a light-filtering headband and a pair of work goggles with magnifying lenses.

Hallon first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story portrayed by Fraser Kelly.[source?] The character was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
